title: Promoting WICO 2.0 from PT Telkom Surabaya Mergoyoso,Tbk. to the customers by using a promotional video
abstract: This Business Communication Final Project (BCFP) is done for PT Telkom Surabaya Mergoyo, Tbk. A company which offers service in telecommunications and internet service provider in Indonesia. The problem of the project is how to promote the products and services that Wico 2.0 offers. If Using the BCFP, the promotional video will be able to help the marketing and the sales to sell the companyâ€™s product and also make the customers aware of the uniqueness of the products. The promotional video contains the products of Wico 2.0 and the Uniqueness of Wico 2.0 itself. The video shows facilities of Wico 2.0. The promotion video will also explain the benefits of Wico 2.0. Using this BCFP, the customers will know more about Wico 2.0. The video can also help the marketing and sales team to sell Wico 2.0, so that hey can increase the marketing of Wico 2.0.
